title: The Æglet's Answer
description: Return to the world of The Kinsman’s Tree, a land full of supernatural wonder, dominated by the oppressive Empire of Chōl. Their mission to locate the Kinsman’s Tree thwarted, Company Jasper languishes in the clutches of the perverse Doctor Scarsburrow. Meanwhile, Nat’s discovery of the Kinsman’s Tree brings him into contact with friends old and new to guide him on his continued search for the Kinsman. Nat’s mother and friends from captivity. Adventure awaits as the tiny Etom prepare for a showdown with forces of the Kinsman’s most ancient enemies.
author: Timothy Michael Hurst
